website_summaries.verdict: A healing clay that is designed for seamless application to the skin.
pros: Helps shrink pores and tighten and tone the skin
Works great as part of a therapeutic facial mask
Can be used in conjunction with traditional skin care treatments to address acne, scars, fine lines, and wrinkles
May be used to revitalize dry, dull and thinning hair
cons: May cause a burning sensation after initial use

customer_reviews.title: If you're thinking about purchasing, go ahead bc I Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my face and hair. What I like most about this clay was the packaging and the wooden spoon it comes with. No mess. I heard it's best to use ACV bc it just clumps up with water. (You be your own judge if you're sensitive to ACV) I plan on using it on my thighs and butt next. My face feels refreshed and my hair is softer than ever. Next time I will leave it on longer. I look forward to future uses bc I can just feel how healthy my hair is now.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Jay

customer_reviews.title: This is the best clay!!
customer_reviews.text: This clay is high quality and first rate in customer service. I love that the clay is very fine, it makes a smooth paste. Made my skin very smooth, the large pores on my nose disappeared. I even brushed my teeth with it, mixed in with baking soda and charcoal. My teeth have become so white and my gums a healthy pink. I would like to learn all that I can use this for.
customer_reviews.author: txchik

customer_reviews.title: My doctor recommended daily consumption to address a skin issue due to ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today. My doctor recommended daily consumption to address a skin issue due to my arthritis. I took it as soon as I got it. It has already helped improve stomach and digestive problems. I also mixed about two tsps with water to form a paste and use as a face mask. That was way too much, which is great because it will last a long time. It made my skin soft and smooth and reduced the redness of my acne.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Turner

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I mix mine with Bragg's raw organic apple cider vinegar (the mother). Amazing result in helping to clean skin and for breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine S.

customer_reviews.title: Was nervous but not anymore
customer_reviews.text: Never put mud or clay on my face so was kind of nervous. But I did a lot of research first and decided to buy this because of the size and value. It was very easy to mix and apply. Removing it was messy but if you use wet napkins it works pretty well and can just throw them in the trash. My skin was red in certain spots but it went away and I can honestly say my skin is definitely smoother. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: smc

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product - don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this product is what it claims to be. When I added water, it turned into a ball of gum (I tried hot and cold water). It was impossible to spread onto skin, and was literally a rubbery ball within seconds. It is certainly not pure clay, and I would be worried about what they are actually putting into it (and on our skin!).
customer_reviews.author: Allison99

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: In just after one use, my pores and ice pick scars have shrunk and smoothed over. They are still there, please don't get me wrong, but they have significantly reduced in size after using Asutra Indian Healing Clay. I love the little wooden scoop that comes with it and that a ribbon was tied around it so you can easily pull it out of the clay powder. Genius! I will update my review if anything changes with more use, but I am so impressed by the first use that I just had to show my support and write a review.
customer_reviews.author: L. L.

customer_reviews.title: So far it's good.
customer_reviews.text: Today was the first time I used it mixed with bottled water and acv! It had my hear soft I have Afro kinky hair texture. It also defined my curls. I also used some on my face and I felt it tightening it. I will be using for a week once a day on my face will update my review then.
customer_reviews.author: Neks

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend from this brand
customer_reviews.text: This is such an important step in my routine. I genuinely believe that using this mask made my skin a huge difference in its appearance. I use it every other day, follow up with my cleanser and a purifying mask if needed, final moisturize. People commented on how my skin looked clearer, (less dull). This is really important ladies and gents, highly recommend from this brand, amazingly smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVED this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVED this product! I was nervous it would be messy or hard to mix, but it wasn't - and even came with an adorable wooden spoon. It didn't clump on me at all as I added the clay first then slowly added the water while stirring. The results after one use were definitely obvious both on my face and my hair. My hair was so soft and shiny - I can't wait to use it again. Best part is the company reached out personally to make sure I was happy with the product - that was nice. I look forward to trying more of their products as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Luna

customer_reviews.title: Have had way better
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but 2 stars because it's a "mask". I have used Indian clay all my life but different brand. I thought I would give this a try but why change something if it is already good. This is not as strong, doesn't dissolve well and takes years to dry. It was a waste of time to order this, put the work on mixing it and putting it on my face, then the process of washing the messiness all for nothing. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: Didn't look at the size - 2lbs is a lot! But can't complain about that. It is tricky to get the right consistency. If you have a pestle and mortar, this is probably the best method. It is also a little tricky to get it to stick to your face. I think it's best to start with a small layer and just keep adding layers - it adheres a bit better that way. Requires patience, but it smells good and the result is softer, smoother skin, so worth the effort, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Bumblebee

customer_reviews.title: GREAT POTENTIAL FOR THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to this all natural thing and I have only made one natural product with this ingredient so far. It worked very well with the deodorant that I made, one of my family members did say that it darkened their armpits, but not sure if that was due to this product or something else. I will definitely continue to use this and update review as necessary. Customer service is very helpful and super nice. Thank you ASUTRA!!!
customer_reviews.author: Myhonestopinion!!

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I’m postpartum and my skin looks horrible, so I have decided to use natural way to improve it. I used clay twice and I love it. Break outs heal faster and my skin looks brighter. I mixed clay with water as well as with apple cider vinegar. Both ways work very well for me. Clay arrived fast, and I really appreciate email with advices how to mix it, and use it! I can only suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strange minty smell
customer_reviews.text: They say this is 100% bentonite clay, but it has a minty smell. That's odd. I've ordered Clay from several companies and I've never had any sort of smell let alone a minty smell. Plus my jar didn't come with the cool wooden scoop people are raving about. That was the main reason I ordered this particular brand instead of my usual.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B

customer_reviews.title: Best Product Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this clay! I swear this is better than any product-based cleansing mask. Once a week I use it for a facial mask and my skin glows for days and looks so healthy. It's also great for a post-workout bath with some Epsom salts. I typically get super sore due to RA, but if I soak in this after working out, it lessens the symptoms. It's messy and you have to kind of play with the amount for the consistency you want, but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love love this clay. It's finer than the other clay brands that I previously used. It's easier to mix, so there's not as much lumps as you would usually expect from a bentonite clay. I love using this in my hair, this product is perfect for dry and brittle hair. And absolutely WONDERFUL on my face. Love it love it !
customer_reviews.author: Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Spa Day MUST Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love using this face mask ,it’s nice to wind down every Tuesday and Friday after work and have this mask fix all my problems stress and skin related!! it’s very relaxing once you get used to the tingle just make sure you don’t use it too often as it can irritate/dry your skin and clog your drains if you’re using it in mass amounts!! (Make sure you dispose of the leftover clay water outside and not down a daily usage drain or else it could cause some clogging problems as it drys over time :)) ) have fun on your spa day!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Who knew🤷🏾❤ wow GREAT stuff
customer_reviews.text: The plastic bottles buttom bent up But not broken🙌🏿 It works on natural hair NOW if you have a perm its possible it will strip it out little by little because vinger added but its WONDERFUL for those going and IS natural like me..❤❤😍😍 cruls pop WOW do monthly and GREAT for face and body weekly
customer_reviews.author: Evangelist KEYSHIA L NORMAN

customer_reviews.title: You get a huge bottle
customer_reviews.text: This stuff seems to work pretty good. You have to get the mix just right or you wind up with either too watery to stick or cement. My face does seem to feel pretty good after I use it. Don't know that it's a super duper miracle facial or anything. I'll probably try something else after I make it through this jar just to compare.
customer_reviews.author: Bird lover

customer_reviews.title: Feels dirty
customer_reviews.text: My face broke out after I used this the first time. That happens sometimes with products and after a few uses it stops. The main reason for the 3 star review though is that I can't stand the way this feels on my face and I hate the mess it makes trying to put it on and clean it off. It's just dirty. It's clay...I know. I'm not sure what I expected, but I don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hesse

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time with this
customer_reviews.text: Attempted to use this product several times but just could not get the proper consistency regardless of what ratio I mixed it with water. Always came out like runny cottage cheese. Too late to send it back. Anybody want it ?
customer_reviews.author: J Drummer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! Using it with diatomaceous earth and psyllium husks to do a cleanse, also using it with apple cider vinegar to do a mud bath for skin and hair--awesome (word to the wise--be careful not to apply it to any skin that is red or irritated). Great company, great product! Even comes with a beautiful wooden scoop...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and packaged well. I've never used bentonite clay before. I love how its finely milled. my family and i felt the difference in our face.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy boo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: "Arrived timely and was packaged well. This is my first experience using bentonite clay as a face mask. I had a bit of a learning curve mixing the clay and water but found if I put the clay in shallow glass container I can use a plastic fork to mix it well. I also learned I don't have to apply a super thick layer to my face to get the desired results. My skin definitely cleaner now! Love that! "
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product if you use masks.  Nothing better.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I'm old with eczema issues. This makes your skin silky soft. I put on my leather elbows and they miraculously made eczema go away with one try and still soft. Also, I notice a measurable difference on my neck where I have sun damage. It lightened and softened the discoloration. For the price of masks, this cannot be beat. Huge container. I also ordered one for my daughter at college.
customer_reviews.author: Pchop

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have had oily skin since my teens (now in my 60’s) causing constant zit breakouts. I can’t count the many products that I’ve tried over the years with little or no improvement. In the last year, using less than a tablespoon of your clay mixed a small amount of apple cider vinegar then applied with a cotton ball nightly has helped immensely. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Worked
customer_reviews.text: My cheeks have a tendency to get really red, itch and break out. Just after one use, the redness was gone. My skin tone looked even and the itching had stopped. I was really surprised at how well it helped. I will definitely continue to purchase this product because of the great results. The only thing I find a little difficult is mixing. I'm just not coordinated enough I guess. The powder is so light and fine...I get it everywhere on my bathroom counter.
customer_reviews.author: AB in AZ

customer_reviews.title: This Clay mask is super fine and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This Clay mask is super fine and easy to use. I love the results and how it feels when applied. having said that I want to clarify that I used with ACV and that it takes a good 20 to 30min to dry, it is a little messy and takes some time to remove it as well. Also, it only takes a little bit so this big container will probably last me a long time. Great costumer care and product.
customer_reviews.author: JHD

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely “TERRIBLE”. I’ve had this item for at least 2 weeks and I am still unable to use it. As water is added to the powder, a instant gathering occurs making it impossible to “whisk” as the instructions say. I have tried using warm water and the clay still does not act properly. I’ve used powder clay masks before and this is the first time that I’ve expierence clay that actually does not want to work properly. Very bad product. I’ve waisted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Suave Borí

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: you can use it for anything, hair , face , skin, is a great mask , so good for anti stress . I have had good response with texture of powder when dissolved with apple cider vinegar. Such good value should last about a year or more and I use this plenty. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jays Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We're really enjoying this clay! I've done 2 facials with it and added to my tub water. A little bit goes a long way....for example, my daughter and I made a clay mask using only half tablespoon of clay and after we both applied very liberal amounts to our faces, we had a good bit left over. Leaves skin soft, smooth and tight. Also the seller provided nice packaging, a nice scoop, and very fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: A.Williams.Fam

customer_reviews.title: when we got home my wife got into Amazon and saw that the Asutra Bentonite Clay was ground finer. It mixes with no lumps and works better ...
customer_reviews.text: I got into some Chiggers a few weeks ago while weeding at my daughters house. Ended up going to Dr and was put on antibiotics and cortisone cream. The places were very itchy and red, my daughter had given me a clay paste to use, when we got home my wife got into Amazon and saw that the Asutra Bentonite Clay was ground finer. It mixes with no lumps and works better that the cream the Dr. gave me. I would recommend this to anyone with skin problems , such as hives or insects bites. Helps with itching and the redness.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for over 5 months now and it’s really helped out my skin. My skin is very oily and this has helped keeping my oil in control and always leave my face very smooth. Has reduced my blemishes slowly but surely and now I rarely break out. Using it 2 times a week and moisturizing my face after. Would totally recommend to someone with acne and oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Fine powder and has a wooden scoop included.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this clay for facial masks and to do an armpit detox. I love it! The fine powder is easy to mix and the wooden scoop that came with it makes it easy to measure. My skin is so soft after I've washed the mask off! I am very pleased with my purchase and would purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: orionsowner

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good quality sodium bentonite clay
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality sodium bentonite clay, but it's a little clumpy and hard to dissolve in water. Otherwise I would give this clay 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shimmer

customer_reviews.title: Go to for skin hands down!!
customer_reviews.text: A friend gave me some of this and I initially laughed! Boy was I wrong, this is my go to for my whole body, my face is incredibly clearer after only one use! I recommend this to everyone I talk to. My favorite part is how fine it's ground up my skin is able to feel the clay working and pulsating as soon as it begins to dry. The little wooden spoon is amazing also, I plan on keeping that long after im done with this jar . Thanks for the quick delivery as well!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette weed

customer_reviews.title: excellent product - will buy again and again and as ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent product - will buy again and again and as often as needed. It works very well. My skin feels very soft and it stays soft - even in this very cold winter. I use it about once every two weeks or so - could use it more often but it works great even using it as infrequently as I am doing currently. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: RMorocco

customer_reviews.title: I love that you can use it for the rest of ...
customer_reviews.text: The product exactly as promised and working phenomenally. Just know that this mask will leave your face or more sensitive areas very very red for a few minutes after washing it off but this is warned on the package and it does go away quickly after. I love that you can use it for the rest of your body and even hair too. I will enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Zena Salem

customer_reviews.title: Not Drying, Lots of Product
customer_reviews.text: I mix this clay with apple cider vinegar and use it as a face mask. The finely milled clay makes for a nice texture for application and it dries down into a hard shell (which I prefer to clays that dry down to a flexible, leather-like texture). What I like about this clay is that it cleans out your pores without making your face too dry. It will leave your skin bright red for a little while after you remove it, so don't put it on right before you plan to leave the house. You also get a ton of product, so unless you're applying daily, you should have enough for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: IJustBlueMyself

customer_reviews.title: I like the packaging and it comes with a cute wooden ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the packaging and it comes with a cute wooden scoop. I tried mixing it with both water and apple cider vinegar. Both gave me different results. With water: my skin felt soft and pretty clean. With ACV: my face appeared more red compared to mixing it with water, but it did clean deeper. I will continue using it and I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: hung le

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to mix and apply
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately difficult to mix properly and to apply the clay.It gets slippery.Aztec clay is superior.
customer_reviews.author: Adil

customer_reviews.title: I can’t say enough good things about this product
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this product. It’s super fine as you would expect from a clay and mixes well. Nice color of gray and the quality is really good. I’ve used other Bentonite clays that have made very little difference. This clay cleared up my eczema and helped me with my liver issues. I recommend this product!! Thank you Asutra
customer_reviews.author: Jay Schuman

customer_reviews.title: This one works good and gives you a lot more product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have been using the more popular brand. This one works good and gives you a lot more product. I do however like the other clay mask I use better. Still very good though
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love the mask. My husband and I used it twice but I haven’t noticed much different on my skin as of yet. I recommend mixing with apple cigar vinegar to help. Overall my fave is clear but I believe a lot has to do with my other products.
customer_reviews.author: latia pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: This makes a great face mask. Mix with and apple cider vinegar or or aloe Vera juice. You can feel the tightening but rest assured it's the mask going to work purifying and detoxifying your face of impurities . Washes off easily and leave behind a soft radiant complexion . I use it twice a week to give myself an at home spa without the spa expensive cost .
customer_reviews.author: Jalon mills

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Was careful to make sure it didn’t irritate my skin, which it did not. Find it refreshing and skin is soft. Helpful hints from company. They really care about you being satisfied. Cute little wooden scoop. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R.

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled
customer_reviews.text: Didnt get this spoon people are talking about...product is very clumpy and difficult to make it a smooth consistency. Not to thrilled with the product so far.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure why but it doesn’t work on me like the previous brand I used...It brightens my skin but i break out like crazy just hours later. Not buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this 100% pure and natural 2lb bentonite clay mask by Asutra. I’ve only used it on my face so far, but it tightens my skin, purifies, and detoxifies incredibly! Can’t wait try it on my hair!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product as a facial clay mask! Great product! It works! It pulls out all the toxins and such from your pores! It comes with instructions and also provides a website that will provide you with gray helpful tips about how to use the product. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seller!!  Amazing product !!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this brand. It’s a must have. It completely cleared up my sons acne. It makes my skin feel like silk. There are so many benefits to the clay. More importantly the seller is AWESOME!! Amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Monteiro

customer_reviews.title: Made in the US
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time ordering something like this as I am just venturing into a chemical/toxin free life. This product arrived on time, was packaged nicely and even had a cute little ribbon sticking out from where the lid screws on so the nice wooden scoop wouldn't get lost in the clay!!! I have used it once thus far, and my skin felt and looked great afterwards. Looking forward to trying it on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Roni B Becker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY love this. My skin look amazing. Its clear and my large pores are visably smaller. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: definitely a great product, leaves skin so smooth and free of ...
customer_reviews.text: definitely a great product, leaves skin so smooth and free of impurities. It is a very good amount of product and great presentation. Will buy again. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kay P

customer_reviews.title: Cleared up posion ivy on my hand
customer_reviews.text: After getting poison ivy while clearing trails last year, I was determined not to suffer it again. I got this product in case it happened again this year. I did end up getting poison ivy just on my hand. I used the clay and it ended the problem after letting the clay sit on my hand for about 3 hours. Thanks for making this product!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING CURLS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for someone else and it makes her Hair SOOO Curly. it makes her natural curls more defined. :D definitely will buy more when i can
customer_reviews.author: dickran

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I use it once a week for a detoxifying bath and after, I feel more energized! And the customer service is awesome! I will buy more for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Ivana C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Used in both toothpaste recipe and skin care. Really like this product because it is finely ground and mixes well.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, when I use to my face, I can tell the pore shrink. I try some for my hair mask. it is amazing,because mine belong to oil hair, I must wash my hair everyday, then after that, I fell my hair not oily and can wash every two days. of course, I just use once for my hair so far. but I will try every two weeks. so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best facial mask out there. Mix it with some organic vinegar and water with a fork and you will get a smooth, easy to apply mask. It makes my skin super soft and clears up any imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Mannino

customer_reviews.title: This item came very quickly and I tried it that ...
customer_reviews.text: This item came very quickly and I tried it that same evening....this product truly made my skin smooth and rejuvenated.....my daughter gave it a try after a long plane trip and it did wonders.....I.will use this regularly....
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Loving the texture and a little goes a long way#
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to the wooden scoop but I didn't get one. I received an email from company rep and she asked for my address so that they could send me a scoop. They sent it to me and I was so pleased the quality of the clay matched the scoop. Sweet! I will purchase more from this company when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: but I do like the feel of the clay on my skin
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it three times so far, but I do like the feel of the clay on my skin. It seems to do everything as advertised and for this, I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: tsoftee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry but this product is far from real clay. It doesn’t smell like one and neither does it act like one. See for yourself with attached picture. As soon as I added water the mixture looked like flour.
customer_reviews.author: Hamida Abu

customer_reviews.title: Great detox clay for bath
customer_reviews.text: Great clay. I like to use it in the bath for a total detox. This stuff is the best clay I've used so far. Customer service was quick to respond. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Regina Wilken

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very smooth texture. I used it to make body powder in my holistic health care practice.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Teeth Polish
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make tooth polish, I have enough to last a least year
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Start with a small amount
customer_reviews.text: I love this clay, I would suggest to start with small amounts for a good consistency. Add more clay or more liquid. I use pure rose water as my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Marchell

customer_reviews.title: AwesomeAwesome!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this stuff!!! Skin started breaking out and couldn’t figure out why- even got a dermatologist prescription for chemical peel- it was awful! Ordered this mud mask and was hopeful but sceptical- WOW!!!! I use it three times a week And my face has never looked and felt better! I get compliments all the time how Clear my skin looks and it helps with wrinkles too! Definitely a keeper! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: aisha

customer_reviews.title: Have tried it once and so far so good. My skin felt soft and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Have tried it once and so far so good. My skin felt soft and smooth. Only used once because my skin is very sensitive and I want to be careful. But it had NO adverse effects.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing and I have used it every day since I ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing and I have used it every day since I got the package in the mail. Only down side is the delivery box was damaged and whatever happened cracked the lid/container. I didn’t lose too much of the clay, but a little bit goes a long way. All in all, this product is an absolute game changer and the wooden spoon the seller sticks inside adds a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good product but missing spoon
customer_reviews.text: I love the mask. I noticed a great difference in my skin after the first use. You get a lot of product for what you pay for. I am disappointed that I didn’t receive the wooden spoon that others have received lol no big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Roark

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Results
customer_reviews.text: Finally tried it for the first time and although my hair seemed softer, the process to mix it took too long and was do very messy.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: MyHealingClay
customer_reviews.text: I have used this clay on my face and also as a mask for my hair. I love it! I could feel the tingling bringing out the impurities on the skin of my face. I will continue to monitor the benefits of this product as I use it more and more. Thank you, ViKi
customer_reviews.author: VivK

customer_reviews.title: Rubbery Texture when wet
customer_reviews.text: I mixed it with some water and the clay became rubbery. Made it very difficult to apply to the face/ hair. ACV helped soften the texture but I don't always use ACV, so the product has less value for me. Switched back to my usual Rhassoul Clay the following week and happy with the results in both water and with ACV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, and the company inserted a little message under the plastic wrap to make sure to reach out if I needed any tips or assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa K. Quinlan

customer_reviews.title: Great masque
customer_reviews.text: I have used it twice in a homemade masque and been extremely pleased with the result.
customer_reviews.author: G. Brees

customer_reviews.title: works great on dermatitus
customer_reviews.text: really dries out the perioral dermititus. put a little on at night and it keeps it at bay. i didnt realize when i ordered it that it was for external use only. was planning on drinking some also. so ill have to find food grade clay for that.
customer_reviews.author: stacy fortenberry

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately it is not let me break that powder to smooth liquid like others clay do
customer_reviews.text: I was bought that clay to shampoo hair . Unfortunately it is not let me break that powder to smooth liquid like others clay do . They have a 30 days return policy . Probably just because it is supposed to be a lots of returns . Bad product. Stay away from ordering this
customer_reviews.author: Zoya

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I've used this once so far and my skin feels amazing. Can't wait to see how it looks and feels in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I’ve only been using this for over a week but ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been using this for over a week but I can already see a difference in the texture of my skin and the size of my pores. Definitely going to try it on my hair next and will mix it with Bragg’.
customer_reviews.author: AnnD

customer_reviews.title: Super stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the way my skins feels after a long bath! I’m so relaxed!
customer_reviews.author: ricki

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this clay for many things, face masks, body mud, hair mud. The quality bis very good, and the service is fast. I will buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Loves to read

customer_reviews.title: So far so so good. I have used it 3 times and it ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so so good. I have used it 3 times and it feels so great, I have used it all over my face. I happened to get this big eye bags if I don't sleep well, so I used it under my eyes and I it made the puffiness go down. I love this product, and only used it 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Indian Healing Clay is the best been using it for years this is if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Indian Healing Clay is the best been using it for years this is if you can a watered down version in clay powder form. Buyer beware! And all the hubub about women etcetera does not deliver a value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Val Perini

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product made in USA.
customer_reviews.text: Great product . Very nice people. Works great does not dry skin or cause any problems. I will continue using daily..
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cavalieri

customer_reviews.title: It’s like a gentle face brightener.  Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this clay! I use it every evening to cleanse my face - I love the gentle tingle and my skin has a new glow. Using for two weeks now!
customer_reviews.author: Joann Cyganovich

customer_reviews.title: Great for clear skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and the helpful tips. I use it as a mask with rose essence water , works well on my oily skin. Also used it to make a soft, homemade deodorant. Thank you for the included wooden spoon. I highly recommend this product .
customer_reviews.author: cool S

customer_reviews.title: Great for hydrating natural hair
customer_reviews.text: This really brings out my curls and I can wash my hair once a week now without worrying about dryness
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product works just as described. Company sent detailed instructions on how to use, very much appreciated the extra info.
customer_reviews.author: L. Babinsack

customer_reviews.title: Quality of manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: This particular brand of bentonite clay is extremely easy to work with because of the quality of manufacturing. I use this product as a key ingredient in the making of natural Toothpaste for my family. I also use this clay to clarify and clear my homemade apple cider wine. The Asutra business attitude is all about customer service, a delight to work and communicate with.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C

customer_reviews.title: Like the results it gives to my skin
customer_reviews.text: Like the results it gives to my skin. I feel it gave me smoother and brighter skin on my face. It was a bit tricky to mix and just a little pounder goes a long way. I didn't even use a full scoop and had enough to do mune, my daughter and my mom's face plus the tops of my ha ds and still through some away. The 2lb will deff last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome clay!! Saved my skin and hair.
customer_reviews.text: I wish i found out about this awesome stuff years ago. Im addicted! I use it on my face and my hair. My thin wavy hair feels full and soft. Its miracle clay!! TY!!
customer_reviews.author: Audix

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It makes you feel that your skin is so clean. 100% recommended. Greetings from Perú.
customer_reviews.author: Pierina Galvez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years now in a tooth powder recipe. I have gone from having pre-periodontal disease to curing it in part due to the bentonite clay. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Product was amazing and there was so much. Good buy.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent facial cleanser. I use it daily. It keeps my skin well conditioned.

product_meta.title: ASUTRA Indian Healing Clay Mask, 2 lbs | For Skin & Hair Care | Detoxify, Soften, Brighten Complexion | Anti-Blemish Acne Treatment | Anti-Ageing Properties | Natural Unscented Sodium Bentonite Clay
feature_bullets: POWERFUL YET GENTLE: With 4 times the strength of calcium bentonite clay masks, our sodium bentonite digs deep to effectively cleanse pores without over-drying. Feel it working in minutes to pull out toxins, chemicals, and impurities in the skin.

GET VENUS WILLIAMS' FAVORITE CLAY: "I use this clay from head to toe. On my hair, it enhances curls and it moisturizes my natural hair texture. I also use it on my face. It reduces pores and it can help with acne as well.- Venus Williams

POTENT ACNE FIGHTER: Trusted for thousands of years to help heal, tighten, and tone skin while minimizing and unclogging pores for more youthful skin. Works to reduce the appearance of pores, brighten skin, and is perfect for dry, irritated skin.

HEALTHY HAIR & SCALP: Our Healing Clay removes dead skin cells and helps to purge your hair of all the toxins that you come in contact with daily. It also helps to Strengthen your hair and prevent hair loss by cleaning hair follicles so that they can absorb water, and so you can continue to grow thicker, healthy hair.

MINERAL-RICH FORMULA: Unlike other brands, our product contains no byproducts, fillers, or preservatives and is never tested on animals. Use this safe, fragrance-free formula on scalp, hair, face, and as body clay for full-body rejuvenation.
